Text:
Top quality DVD, phenomenal sound and picture. The direction composition and cinematography in this production are amazing. Thumbs up to the Cameraman, editor and director. And to Soulrebel2008 for the encoding and uploading of this DVD.

As stated in the info by soulrebel2008... 'the film makes it evident that music is the heartbeat of the culture'. I hope that Kemoy returns to the industry, as she has a fantastic voice, and could/would also do very well as a jazz and soul singer.

Peace and unity.
